mapper.sql: u.id, u.username, u.password, u.phone, u.email, u.created, u.updated
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user( username, password, phone, email, created, updated, level ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{created}, #{updated}, #{level} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.username = #{username} UNION SELECT * FROM tb_administrator AS a WHERE a.username = #{username} ) as c
